entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 12:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
